import React, { useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { GlobalContext } from "../../context/GlobalState"; import Footer from "../../components/layout/Footer"; const VerifyCode = () => { const { userRegistration, isLoading, isLoggedIn } = useContext(GlobalContext); const { register, handleSubmit, errors, reset } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { userRegistration(data); reset(); }; return ( <>

Email verification code

{errors.username && errors.username.message}

Create account to continue

Already have an account? Sign in
{errors.username && errors.username.message}
{errors.email && errors.email.message}
{errors.account_type && errors.account_type.message}
{errors.password && errors.password.message}
{errors.conf_password && errors.conf_password.message}
); }; export default VerifyCode;
